FuncDef:
The peer-backup download-vrrp-table delay-time command configures the delay for disabling the forwarding function when the master device becomes the backup device.
The undo peer-backup download-vrrp-table delay-time command restores the default delay for disabling the forwarding function when the master device becomes the backup device.
By default, the delay is 0 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the delay time.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 60, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the delay for disabling the forwarding function when the master device becomes the backup device, run the peer-backup download-vrrp-table delay-time command.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, when the master device becomes the backup device, the forwarding function is disabled delay-time-value seconds later. When delay-time-value is set to 0, the forwarding function is disabled immediately.
